name: subscript
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a word, letter, number, or symbol written or printed just below another word, letter, number, or symbol, usually in a smaller size: Format the figure one in superscript and the figure three in subscript. The subscripts s and m denote respectively quantities downstream and upstream of the shock. subscript figures Compare
